alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 8:36PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Patchy freezing fog developing across portions of northern and central Nevada... Nevada Department of Transportation webcams are showing patchy areas of freezing fog developing across several valley locations, including the Humboldt River valley and I-80. The city of Wells and points east are seeing patchy freezing fog with the visibility dropping to a half mile or less. Other valley locations in Humboldt, Elko, Lander, and Eureka counties could also see freezing fog develop during the night with drastically changing visibility. If traveling tonight, please use low beams and reduce speed due to the fog. In addition, some slick spots may be present due to the icy conditions from some of the thicker fog. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
